Description:
Position Title:             GP AestheticEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                        up to 30K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualifications plus monthly commissionsJob Location:            Dubai, UAE About the Client:An aesthetic clinic based in Dubai, inspired by Southern American concept. Job Description:Perform aesthetic procedures such as injections, laser therapies, and fillers.
Assess patients' aesthetic concerns, provide expert advice, and recommend appropriate treatments.
Develop personalized treatment plans based on patient needs, maintain a clean and sterile treatment area, and document all treatment procedures.
Monitor patient progress post-treatment, address concerns, and make adjustments as necessary.
Stay up-to-date on the latest aesthetic procedures and trends through continuous learning and trainingSkills
Skills:
Open to Arab nationals
50 years old and below
Minimum 10 years of experience 
Must have DHA license
Knowledge and experience in performing dermatological procedures
Must have own client base and ability to attract and bring them to the clinic
